author: trent_vanepps
content: super amazing to see interop come to life from remote.. <@291925846556540928> I heard it mentioned the core team consulted with the Cosmos folks about a "Game of Stakes" type incentivised testnet > is that in the works and if so when will more details be released

author: djrtwo
content: Public and potentially incentivized testnets are beung discussed, but not set in the strategy wrt incentivized testnets. Now that things are getting closer we'll revisit it. Will share when we have our ideas layed out

author: djrtwo
content: Sorry that was kind of a non-answer. We're eager to get people playing with and breaking things but only beginning to enter that phase. Will keep you updated!

author: trent_vanepps
content: that works as a "yes, more details to come" answer for now
